title: Future
description: Information specific to future contract instruments

paymentType.$comment: Consult External Code List table ExternalPaymentTypeCode

allocationRoundLot.description: Pre-defined lot size for allocation purposes

priceFactor.description: Factor that indicates the number of shares used for price formation

tradingStartDate.description: Date when trading of the financial instrument begins

lastPrice.description: Initial price of the asset AFTER the corporate action

valueTypeCode.description: Code that defines the instrument value type, for example, price or rate
valueTypeCode.$comment: Consult External Code List table ExternalValueTypeCode

baseCode.description: Number of days for instrument calculation (252, 360, 365, etc)

conversionCriteria.$comment: Consult External Code List table ExternalCriteriaTypeCode

maturityDateTargetPoint.description: Used in conjunction with BaseCode and RequiredConversionIndicator fields for rate to price conversion

requiredConversionIndicator.description: Indicates if the contract traded in rate should be converted to price

contractMultiplier.description: Ratio between contract size and commodity quotation quantity

assetQuotationQuantity.description: Indicates the quantity of the commodity on which the trade price is based

withdrawalDays.description: Number of withdrawal days, considering the trading date until the contract maturity date

workingDays.description: Number of business days, considering the trading date until the contract maturity date

calendarDays.description: Number of calendar days, considering the trading date until the contract maturity date

exercisePrice.description: Predetermined price of the underlying asset of the derivative contract

exerciseStyle.description: Code that defines how an option can be exercised
exerciseStyle.$comment: Consult External Code List table ExternalExerciseStyleCode

optionType.description: Specifies whether an option is call or put
optionType.$comment: Consult External Code List table ExternalOptionTypeCode

premiumUpfrontIndicator.description: Indicates whether equity options have their premium paid in advance or not

protectionFlag.description: Indicates that the option is protected against corporate events

automaticExerciseIndicator.description: Defines whether the option is exercised automatically

currency.description: Currency code in which the amount is denominated
currency.$comment: Consult External Code List table ExternalCurrencyCode
